Package br.com.kirgh.app.repositories

Interface UserRelationRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<UserRelation,UserRelationPK>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<UserRelation,UserRelationPK>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<UserRelation,UserRelationPK>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<UserRelation,UserRelationPK>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<UserRelation,UserRelationPK>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<UserRelation>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<UserRelation,UserRelationPK>
public interface UserRelationRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<UserRelation,UserRelationPK>
This code is defining a Spring Data JPA repository interface for the UserRelation entity. The interface extends the JpaRepository interface, which provides basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for the entity. The UserRelationPK is the primary key class for the UserRelation entity, and it is used as the second generic type parameter of the JpaRepository interface. This allows the repository to handle composite primary keys.

  • Method Details

    • deleteParentRelationByChildId

      @Transactional @Modifying @Query(nativeQuery=true, value=" DELETE FROM\n user_relations\n WHERE\n child_id = :childId\n") void deleteParentRelationByChildId(@Param("childId") UUID childId)
      The function deletes a parent-child relationship from the user_relations table based on the child's ID.
      Parameters:
      childId - The childId parameter is a UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) that represents the ID of the child for which the parent relation needs to be deleted.

    • getAllUsersRelationBoundUser

      @Query(nativeQuery=true, value=" SELECT\n user_relations.child_id, user_relations.owner_id, user_relations.relation_type\n FROM\n user_relations\n WHERE\n owner_id = :ownerId\n") List<UserRelation> getAllUsersRelationBoundUser(@Param("ownerId") UUID ownerId)
      The function retrieves all user relations associated with a specific owner ID.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ownerId parameter is a UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) that represents the ID of the owner user.
      Returns:
      The query is returning a list of UserRelation objects.
